column1: In Burkina Faso, 848,000 people are displaced by violence. In Centre-Nord region, which hosts 1/2 of all IDPs, @UNHCR_BF supports regional health services w. $160,000 for #coronavirus response. Our donors made this possible: @StatePRM @MFA_Lu @GvtMonaco @UNHCRgov
